author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
The Demon & The Wolf is a full Narrative Campaign for Black Site Studio's HAMETSU, the Demon Hunting solo and CoOperative game set in Feudal Japan. I'm joined by Geoff, Dave and Ben for our third game. We've been met by THE WITNESS. Seeing us defend the town against the Oni, the heroes have been recruited to travel to the origin of the Cataclysm to try to stop it! 

Check out the HAMETSU Rulebook HERE: https://blacksitestudio.com/en-ca/products/hametsu-core-rulebook

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames 

Join us on DISCORD: https://discord.gg/CCmeRy3

Want to challenge Ash to a game? Email him at GuerrillaMiniatureGames@gmail.com or message him through his Facebook Page!

Follow Ash on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/outofthebasementintothestreets

GMG Measuring Gauges and Tokens available HERE: http://deathraydesigns.com/product-category/accessories/guerrilla-m
title: HAMETSU - The Demon & The Wolf Campaign - Part 3

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
Welcome back to Inside Tabletop. In this series I talk to people that live and work in Gaming, getting them to share their insights on the business of game entertainment. 

We've had back to back, two different Design teams at Games Workshop drop two parallel products for their Masthead Games. Why does it feel like they are moving in opposite directions?

PLEASE SUBSCRIBE TO THE NEW CHANNEL TO DEFEAT SKYNET! 

If you're a Patron; this episode is also available as an exclusive audio Podcast today as well that you'll have already heard three days early!

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames

GMG Measuring Gau
title: Inside Tabletop  - Why is 40k and AoS game design moving in opposite directions?
